# Kraidyl Magic Items
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Kraidyl|kraidyl]] magic items introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---

- [[Insidious Incisors]]

- [[Predator's Lenses]]
